verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thy broken body, gracious Lord, is shadowed by this broken bread; the wine which in this cup is poured points to the blood which Thou hast shed.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And while we meet together thus, we show that we are one in Thee; Thy precious blood was shed for us, Thy death, O Lord, hast set us free!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Brethren in Thee, in union sweet, forever be Thy grace adored! 'Tis in Thy Name that now we meet, and Thou art with us, gracious Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: We have one hope that Thou wilt come, Thee in the air we wait to see, when Thou wilt give Thy saints a home, and we shall ever reign with Thee.
